Articles.Content:
I think some actions for fuel lines would be awesome, maybe reverse flow but even an on and off and/or toggle would be good.

also an inflight action assignment system would be awesome, more then once i have launched, gotten half way through the mission and realized i forgot to assign action groups.

lastly throttle position...i've been thinking about independent throttle for each engine and was stuck on having a slider on the engine (in the stage) but it might work better to use action groups for this...

maybe have an action to enter in a throttle percentage or have some set ones...would be nice for when you want to full throttle immediately or if your building something with cot out of line with com.
infinite action groups bound to your button of choice would be nice too.
